mapper.select: SELECT sid as sid, filename as filename, pathology_id as pathology_id, pathology_id_ref as pathology_id_ref, block as block, stain as stain, pathID_ch as pathID_ch, create_date as create_date, modify_date as modify_date, first_scan_date as first_scan_date, last_scan_date as last_scan_date, image_type as image_type, scanner_type as scanner_type, hupax_basefolder_name as hupax_basefolder_name, sectra_basefolder_name as sectra_basefolder_name, file_path as file_path, file_size as file_size, download_count as download_count FROM slide_list
